title: Shakespeare In the Park Suite Offer
title_zh: Shakespeare In the Park Suite Offer
short_description_en: Skip the line and enjoy VIP tickets with our Shakespeare In The Park Suite Offer!. Enjoy a beautiful night in Central Park under the stars watching world-class theater. For a limited time, book a suite and call our reservations team on +1.212.838.8000 to reserve two tickets to this beloved annual tradition. This summer's shows will be Othello (May 29- June 24) and a musical adaptation of Twelfth Night (July 17- August 19).
short_description_zh: Skip the line and enjoy VIP tickets with our Shakespeare In The Park Suite Offer!. Enjoy a beautiful night in Central Park under the stars watching world-class theater. For a limited time, book a suite and call our reservations team on +1.212.838.8000 to reserve two tickets to this beloved annual tradition. This summer's shows will be Othello (May 29- June 24) and a musical adaptation of Twelfth Night (July 17- August 19).
offer_includes_en: • VIP tickets for two to Shakespeare in the Park, conveniently located in Central Park just a short walk from the hotel. View performance schedule here
offer_includes_zh: • VIP tickets for two to Shakespeare in the Park, conveniently located in Central Park just a short walk from the hotel. View performance schedule here
terms_en:
• Offer is available from now through August 19th, 2018
  • Offer requires 24-hour advance purchase
  • Maximum of two tickets per room. Call our Reservations team on +1.212.838.8000 for this offer
  • VIP tickets will be provided at check-in
